香港媽媽原文:
Below is a draft letter from a local discussion group complaining Junius Ho, lawyer and politician who teamed up with the triads for the violence last night. Feel free to share and send to the Law Society for disciplinary action. Thanks!

replies.msg:
Email: complaints@hklawsoc.org.hk
Dear Sirs,
1. I write to complain about the conduct of Mr. Ho Kwan Yiu in the early morning of 22nd July 2019 in Yuen Long.
Facts
2. It is widely reported that starting from the late night of 21st July 2019, a gang of men dressed in white t-shirts entered Yuen Long West Rail Station and beat up citizens in the station area, in the paid station area, and even in the train compartment.
3. See, for example:-
a. A video posted by Mingpao Weekly; （1）
b. A video of the process taken by a Stand News Journalist;（2）
c. A video taken by a Stand News journalist while being beaten up; （3）
d. A news article from Stand News. （4）
4. The attack resulted in many injuries to ordinary citizens, including to a Stand News journalist and a former TVB journalist. （5）
5. There is also a widely circulating video from the same night in which Mr. Ho publicly expressed his support to a group of men dressed in white t-shirts in Yuen Long. Mr. Ho made a thumbs-up gesture and clapped his hands to show his approval to these men. In the video, he is also shown to shake the hand of a man in white and say “辛苦你啦”. The video is accessible online（6）and a copy thereof is enclosed hereto.
（1）
https://www.facebook.com/mpwculture/videos/1044766625715944
（2）
https://www.facebook.com/standnewshk/videos/407353793207073/
（3）
https://www.facebook.com/standnewshk/videos/477630836335546
（4）
https://thestandnews.com/politics/%E5%85%83%E6%9C%97%E7%AB%99%E6%83%A1%E7%85%9E%E6%89%8B%E6%8C%81%E6%9C%A8%E6%A3%92%E6%89%93%E4%BA%BA-%E5%B8%82%E6%B0%91%E8%A8%98%E8%80%85%E8%A2%AB%E8%BF%BD%E6%89%93%E5%8F%97%E5%82%B7-%E6%9C%AA%E8%A6%8B%E8%AD%A6%E5%93%A1%E5%9F%B7%E6%B3%95/?fbclid=IwAR3im2YULquzzFcUvMGbmI28mriNq0ahnyojFFD5iSyctJl6HwfpRr6iP9U
（5）
https://thestandnews.com/politics/%E5%85%83%E6%9C%97%E6%83%A1%E7%85%9E%E7%BE%A4%E6%AF%86%E8%A8%98%E8%80%85%E5%B8%82%E6%B0%91-%E7%AB%8B%E5%A0%B4-%E8%A8%98%E8%80%85%E9%9B%99%E6%89%8B-%E5%8F%B3%E8%82%A9-%E9%A0%AD%E9%83%A8%E5%8F%97%E5%82%B7/?fbclid=IwAR1-93ZMgNHiPjUDNclHJ8oTDETEgb2-JEBAA_3wL8hXwct3WTu5xaMcmi0
（6）
https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=2320755911338882
6. This is also reported in Apple Daily. The report is accessible online（7）and a copy thereof is enclosed hereto.
7. The same man whom greeted Mr. Ho and another man whose hand Mr. Ho shook were captured in the videos taken in the Yuen Long West Rail Station as a member of the gang who beat up ordinary citizens, as below:-
https://na.cx/i/JCscQgn.png
https://na.cx/i/5jNDLPJ.png
（7）
https://hk.news.appledaily.com/local/realtime/article/20190722/59848508
8. The criminal, indiscriminate violence employed by the gang of men in white shirts in Yuen Long was shocking to any right-thinking member of the public. One would have thought that it should be unthinkable for any self-respecting person to be associated with such a criminal gang or any member thereof. Mr. Ho not only proves this wrong, he appears to be publicly commending members of the gang for their actions on the night of 21st-22nd July 2019.
9. It is provided in Principle 1.02 of the Hong Kong Solicitors’ Guide to Professional Conduct that “a solicitor is an officer of the Court (see s 3(2) of the Legal Practitioners Ordinance (Cap. 159), and should conduct himself appropriately in professional and private matters”. As per Ma CJHC (as he then was) in A Solicitor v The Law Society of Hong Kong (unreported) CACV 107/2005, 7th July 2006 at paragraph 79: “A solicitor is a member of an honourable profession, an officer of the court and one of the three bodies (together with the courts and barristers) primarily responsible for the administration of justice. The public’s perception of a solicitor is exactly these terms.”

10. I take the view that a) Mr. Ho’s conduct is unbefitting of a solicitor, and b) contrary to principle 1.02 of the Guide and/or Rule 2 of the Solicitors’ Practice Rules (Cap. 159H) in that Mr. Ho did not conduct himself appropriately but conducted himself in a manner likely to bring the profession into disrepute.
11. As a person with a public profile (including being a former President of the Law Society), Mr. Ho is well known to be a solicitor. Mr. Ho’s acts in the public eye would and do in fact affect the public perception of solicitors.
12. Moreover, the charge of conduct unbefitting of a solicitor is not limited to acts performed in the capacity of a solicitor (Halsbury’s Laws of Hong Kong [240.081], A Solicitor v The Law Society of Hong Kong (unreported) CACV 107/2005, 7th July 2006 at paragraph 82). Similarly, Principle 1.02 of the Guide explicitly states that a solicitor is to conduct himself appropriately in professional and private matters” (emphasis added). The Commentary to Principle 1.02 continues: “A solicitor, whether practising or not, is an officer of the Court. Certain standards of behaviour are required of a solicitor, as an officer of the Court and as a member of the profession, in his business activities outside legal practice and in his private life” (emphasis added).
13. I find the conduct of Mr. Ho abhorrent and a disgrace to the profession, and hence ask that the Law Society do take prompt disciplinary action accordingly. I look forward to hearing from the Law Society in relation to progress in this case.

[文宣]推到全世界都知香港有幾威
https://lih.kg/1347040
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

參選立法會
何君堯於2012年首次參選，但只獲得10,805票，排名倒數第三落敗。

及後於2016年，他獲得藝人兼惠州政協陳小春支持[18]，最終以35,657票，即5,508票之差取代尋求連任的李卓人取得新界西末席，成功當選立法會議員。不過，於其中一個論壇上，自由黨周永勤表示因受到威嚇，不想身邊的人惹上更高層次的麻煩，宣布停止一切選舉活動，並鞠躬致歉[19]。他後來交代事件經過，又指7月中有「駐港部門」人士游說他棄選，稱「我們想當選的人不是你，你並沒有我們的祝福。」[20]

replies.msg:
拋磚引玉，希望大家討論吓不同意見既成效

1. 短期內舉辦光復元朗行動

2. 搜集任何相關資料，包括但不限有關人仕個人資料，相關物業/店舖資料，活躍地點，行蹤等等

3. 透過海關，入境，警方，食環等等相關部門，清洗元朗黃賭毒產業鏈 ，烏煙瘴氣好多巴打覺得警黑合作，成效不大

4. 眾籌去聘請例如G4S/黑水等國際保安公司，保護各議員，知名人仕如陳伯，記者們，其他有需要市民等等好多巴打贊成呢個方案

5. 元朗放盤/退租，警黑合作，治安全無

6. 舉報僭建

7. 全民對抗新鴻基SHK運動

[集思廣益]發夢夢到殲滅元朗官商鄉黑計劃
https://lih.kg/1342215
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

[發夢][眾籌]聘請G4S/黑水保護議員，記者，陳伯，市民等是否可行？
https://lih.kg/1343417
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

[發夢][不合作][長期]元朗放盤/退租行動，考慮吓
https://lih.kg/1345525
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
